org.scilab.modules.scinotes
Class ScilabView

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.text.View
      javax.swing.text.CompositeView
          javax.swing.text.BoxView
              javax.swing.text.WrappedPlainView
                  org.scilab.modules.scinotes.ScilabView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.SwingConstants, javax.swing.text.TabExpander
public class ScilabView
extends javax.swing.text.WrappedPlainView

This important class is mainly used to render a document

drawUnselectedText

protected int drawUnselectedText(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                 int sx,
                                 int sy,
                                 int p0,
                                 int p1)
                          throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
Very important method since we draw the text in this method !!

Overrides:
drawUnselectedText in class javax.swing.text.WrappedPlainView
Parameters:
g - the graphics where to draw
sx - the x-coordinate where to draw
sy - the y-coordinate ... (guess the end of the sentence)
p0 - the start of the text in the doc
p1 - the end of the text in the doc
Returns:
the x-coordinate where to draw the next piece of text
Throws:
javax.swing.text.BadLocationException - if p0 and p1 are bad positions in the text

setTabRepresentation

public void setTabRepresentation(int type)
Used to give the way to represent a tabulation. By default TABVERTICAL is used.

Parameters:
type - must be TABVERTICAL or TABDOUBLECHEVRONS or TABHORIZONTAL If a bad value is given, then nothing will be drawn

setTabRepresentation

public void setTabRepresentation(char rep)
Used to represent a tabulation with the given character ('|' or '#' or...)

Parameters:
rep - the char representing a tab

Used to represent a tabulation

Parameters:
tabulation - a Tabulation

paintTab

protected void paintTab(javax.swing.text.Segment text,
                        int x,
                        int y,
                        java.awt.Graphics g,
                        int start)
Method to paint a tabulation according to the setTabRepresentation.

Parameters:
text - the segment of text representing a tabulation
x - the x-coordinate where to draw
y - the y-coordinate where to draw
g - the graphics ... (yeah ! once again)
start - the position in the document
